item.title: Wordlist Generation
item.description: INTRODUCTION Sometimes it can be a little daunting to create custom wordlists. Generally, you either need some specialized tools, or to be well-versed in bash scripting. Another issue you’ll encounter is that wordlists tend to be large - very large. As such, when you’re working with them, it’s easy to… accidentally exceed your machine’s memory limits or use up too much disk space waste a lot of CPU time. I’ll try to help you overcome all these issues.
